name: Santa Attack
description:
box-corp has taken over Santa's grotto and hes getting revenge.

I wanted to make something for the  jam but didn't exactly have that much time and wanted to have some fun so...

Merry Christmas!

CONTROLS-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

a/left arrow  ===== left

d/right arrow ===== right

w/up arrow ===== jump

left click ===== shoot where your mouse is

right click===== release bomb towards where your mouse
